ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Prepare for another nerf... =8^P
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, it affects every bard - since it weakens us even further. Melee is king in Kunark. Before this change players who owned one haste item had a choice
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, it affects every bard - since it weakens us even further. Melee is
king in Kunark. Before this change players who owned one haste item had a
choice of grouping with an enchanter, shaman or bard. All three of these
classes could get them to maximum haste. All three classes were equal in
this respect. Now there is a definite hierarchy to them. Enchanter on top
(of course), then shaman, and bard at the bottom (of course).

> From: "Daniel Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
> Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Date: Tue, 19 Sep 2000 09:45:49 -0500
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Prepare for another nerf... =8^P
>
> I don't own any haste items so this doesn't affect me
